bill.title: Practice of midwifery; establish board and provide standards for licensure.
bill.description: An Act To Codify Sections 73-72-1 Through 73-72-21, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Enact Standards For The Practice Of Midwifery; To Create A Mississippi Licensed Midwifery Board And Prescribe Its Membership; To Authorize The Board To Issue Rules And Regulations To Carry Out The Provisions Of The Midwifery Practice Act; To Authorize The State Department Of Health To Issue Licenses And Administer The Provisions Of This Act; To Provide For License Qualifications And Renewal, Suspension And Reinstatement; To Prescribe Fees; To Provide Grounds For License Disciplinary Action; To Provide For The Applicability Of This Act And The Use Of Title "licensed Midwife"; To Provide Criminal Penalties For Violations Of This Act; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Welfare;Appropriations
